scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:translator"
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run build:frontend" "npm run build:gateway" "npm run build:translator"
scripts.build:translator: cd translator && echo 'Python service - no build step required'
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:frontend" "npm run start:gateway" "npm run start:translator"
scripts.test: concurrently "npm run test:frontend" "npm run test:gateway" "npm run test:translator"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:gateway && npm run install:translator
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules frontend/node_modules gateway/node_modules translator/__pycache__ frontend/.next gateway/dist
